project1.name: Nomi Movies
project1.introText: This project was done in groups of 4 in the BCIT Front-End Developer program with the goal being to create a movie database that could save a users favorites and display movies from the TMDB API. My group chose to use NextJS and include a database hosted on Supabase to store our favorites instead of using local browser storage. I chose to use a database because then you would be able to sync favorites across multiple devices and not just save them locally.

0.title: Coding in a team
0.content: This project helped me learn to code in a group using industry standard workflows eg. Scrum and Waterfall methodologies using Trello or Jira. Using these strategies it helped me learn how to program effectively in a group environment to create a superior product than what was asked of me.

project2.name: 3D Gallery
project2.introText: This project was for myself to get better at using different javascript libraries, one thing about myself is that I love to find new and exciting things and try to build something with them. My choice to use threeJS was because I found that a lot of really popular websites use it and wanted to experience it for myself, Ex.

0.title: Learning New Things
0.content: Working in a 3D environment and dealing with lighting or other things like font text geometry was very different from what I am used to with web development but stepping outside of my comfort zone and learning new things is something I really enjoy to do. Overall I think that this project has given me a lot more respect for game developers and 3D model designers and I learned a lot about programming inside of a 3D scene.
